claim: Hypertension is defined as blood pressure over 140/90 mmHg

supporting.text: The American Heart Association defines hypertension as a sustained blood pressure reading of 140/90 mmHg or higher.

attacks.text: The American Heart Association defines hypertension as a sustained blood pressure reading of 140/90 mmHg or higher.
